Sentence: WASHINGTON U.S. intelligence officials now believe North Korea is developing the technology to make nuclear warheads small enough to fit atop the country 's growing arsenal of missideS ( potentially putting Tokyo and U.S. troops based in Japan at risk , according to officials who have received the intelligence reports .
